unnormalised: Weather-dependent yields, eh? Tell me about it! Last monsoon in Maharashtra was a total disaster. Lost half my groundnut crop near Nagpur. Remember 15/08/2023? No rain at all! My kisan credit card is crying. Even my cousin, Anand at IARI, says this is the new normal. Heard somewhere El Nino will hit hard again in 2024. Praying to Lord Indra by 17:00 hrs everyday for a better crop this year. Maybe next year, on 26/01, things will improve. Jai Kisan!
normalised: Weather-dependent yields, eh? Tell me about it! Last monsoon in Maharashtra was a total disaster. Lost half my groundnut crop near Nagpur. Remember fifteenth August two thousand and twenty three? No rain at all! My kisan credit card is crying. Even my cousin, Anand at I A R I, says this is the new normal. Heard somewhere El Nino will hit hard again in two thousand and twenty four. Praying to Lord Indra by seventeen hundred hours everyday for a better crop this year. Maybe next year, on twenty sixth January, things will improve. Jai Kisan!
